quote: I shall tell you a great secret, my friend. Do not wait for the last judgment. It takes place every day.
Dear Mrs. Chown, Ignore your son's attempts to teach you physics. Physics isn't the most important thing. Love is. Best wishes, Richard Feynman.
I think I can safely say that nobody understands quantum mechanics.
Science may set limits to knowledge, but should not set limits to imagination.
Nothing in education is so astonishing as the amount of ignorance it accumulates in the form of inert facts.
Any astronomer can predict with absolute accuracy just where every star in the universe will be at 11:30 tonight. He can make no such prediction about his teenage daughter.
